name: Bimbo Pong
description:
Simple adaptation of the 1972 Atari game 'Pong' with my personal spin on it. Developed by Ella Osho. The second game I have programmed from scratch and the first game I have programmed with key bind movement. Intended for use as a mini game activity in a bigger game project.

Background Music used in game: 'When we're all together' by Bratz
